name: CareCam
0:
”Alexa,talk to my front door camera.”
”Alexa,show me my front door camera.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
CareCam cameras are designed to help you look after your home and family in a more convenient and smarter way – even when you’re away.
With the CareCam Skill and Alexa, you can now access your CareCam Camera via voice control by simply saying "Alexa,show me the Camera."

Before you get started, please make sure your CareCam device is online and updated to the latest firmware. 
To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button to link your CareCam account and discover your CareCam cameras. 

After linking your CareCam account and discovering your CareCam cameras in your Alexa account, you can start controlling your cameras. 

To look the camera of the front door camera, you can say: 
“Alexa，show me the front door camera”
“Alexa, talk to the front door camera” 

Compatible CareCam Cameras: 
AJR53PQ0804
AJR30PG0705
AJL33PC0801

Firmware version：
YGT.AJR53PQ0804-v200821.1514 or higher;
YGT.AJL33PC0801-v200828.2104 or higher;
YGT.AJL30PG0803-v200923.1221 or higher;


Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices: 
-Echo Show 


*When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. 
The name is equivalent to the location of where the camera was installed and can be found and configured in the CareCam app. 
You can also add CareCam cameras to new or existing groups in the Alexa app.
